title: How to Make Caramel Nut Frosting

steps.headline: Add butter, brown sugar and milk to a saucepan.
Bring mixture to a boil, over medium heat, stirring constantly.
Cook until the sugar is dissolved.
Add powdered sugar and beat until frosting is of spreading consistency.
Stir again until everything is well mixed..
Use to frost a two-layer 8-inch cake.

text: Add butter, brown sugar and milk to a saucepan.  Bring mixture to a boil, over medium heat, stirring constantly.  Cook until the sugar is dissolved.  Allow the mixture to cool.  Add powdered sugar and beat until frosting is of spreading consistency.  Add chopped nuts and vanilla.  Stir again until everything is well mixed..  Use to frost a two-layer 8-inch cake.  Finished.
